name: KittyAccessControl is Pausable
description: A facet of KittyCore that manages special access privileges.

external-functions.name: setCEO(address _newCEO) external onlyCEO
external-functions.description: Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.

params.name: _newCEO
params.description: The address of the new CEO

external-functions.name: setCFO(address _newCFO) external onlyCEO
external-functions.description: Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.

params.name: _newCFO
params.description: The address of the new CFO

external-functions.name: setCOO(address _newCOO) external onlyCEO
external-functions.description: Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.

params.name: _newCOO
params.description: The address of the new COO
